ygData.msgSnippet: I do appreciate your offer, but it is not that simple. I will attempt to finish the story arcs that are open, but then I will have to cut back or even leave.

I do appreciate your offer, but it is not that simple. 

I will attempt to finish the story arcs that are open, but then I will
have to cut back or even leave. My wife has taken ill, and will require
more attention from me for help with her own illness as well as help
around around the house for the forseable future. It is possible she
will have to leave work to go on disability. 

So I will play it by ear, but my posts may not be as frequent as they
once were. 

I am playing this by ear, and do what I can.

Oh, and the minions (Deepstryke, Phobia, Nightrazor, Tumult, Decibel)
are all NPC's and if someone wants to help out there that would be
great, just let me know. 

Preston
